name: Frida-android-hooks
tagline: Lets you hook LoadURL Method Calls in Frida ( Android )
body:
### Welcome to Firda- Hooks  ( Android )
You will find different different scripts to hook various api calls in the android platform to conduct security analysis.
Right now , we have two scripts :

1. WebView loadUrl() : android.webkit.WebView
2. getDeviceId() : android.telephony.TelephonyManager


### SetUp 

Setup :

1 . Load Firda -server into your android device .

    $ curl -O https://build.frida.re/frida/android/arm/bin/frida-server
    $ adb push frida-server /data/local/tmp/
    $ adb shell "chmod 755 /data/local/tmp/frida-server"
    $ adb shell "/data/local/tmp/frida-server &" 

2 . Install frida on your machine .
    easy_install frida

3 . Change the package_name variable in the script to match the application you are instrumenting .

4 . Run :
    python hook_file_name_here.py

5 . Run any app that uses the instrumented methods and check the script output .

Have fun !

### Authors and Contributors
 @antojoseph 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Scripts ? Check out our [documentation](https://frida.re) or [contact support](Twitter : @antojosep007) or Log an Issue and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
